description: To mitigate the identified vulnerability affecting the Microsoft Remote Registry Service, system administrators are advised to apply the corresponding update patches across affected systems. The impacted products and their build numbers include Windows 10 (various builds) and Windows 11 across different versions. Specific KB articles for the updates are KB5032190, KB5032192, KB5032196, KB5032189, and KB5032199, among others. Administrators can obtain the update packages from these links: [KB5032197](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032197), [KB5032192](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032192), [KB5032199](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032199), [KB5032254](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032254), [KB5032249](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032249), [KB5032196](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032196), [KB5032252](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032252), and [KB5032198](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032198). Ensuring that these updates are applied will help protect against potential exploitation scenarios.
